channel.title: How do i change objects and monsters?
channel.description:
i want to make special teletabs and bosses i want to change the teletab name to ("Boss tele: Example") and make it teleport to a diferent place
i also want to change the names of the monsters and make their stats diferent so they hit harder and have more health etc
i know this is posible but i dont know how?

item.title: How do i change objects and monsters?
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

ok i went in my class8 and i modified the ardougne tele to this

    if (i == 2781) {
        class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
        class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Teleport";
        class8.anInt174 = 7796;//7307
        class8.anInt181 = 450;
        class8.anInt190 = 373;
        class8.anInt198 = 0;
        class8.anInt169 = 0;
        class8.anInt194 = 0;
        class8.aBoolean176 = false;
        class8.aString170 = "Boss tele: Alkayna";
        class8.aByteArray178 = "This will teleport me to Alkayna the Demon, i must be prepare before i teleport.".getBytes();

when i click teleport it wields it? how do i make it teleport?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change objects and monsters?

item.title: How do i change objects and monsters?
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

search in
client.java
clickingmost.java
texthandler.java

if their not in their lets say “Ape Toll” for example alot of servers leave it blank
youll have to search for the ID.
